## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new functions/classes

### Tests

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested in the example site (`test-status-site`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, CHANGELOG, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments
- [ ] I have updated type definitions if needed
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated with my changes under "Unreleased" section

### Build

- [ ] My changes build without errors (`npm run build`)
- [ ] I have tested the built plugin in a real Docusaurus site
- [ ] No TypeScript errors (`tsc --noEmit`)

### Git

- [ ] My commits follow the Conventional Commits specification
- [ ] My branch is up to date with `main`
- [ ] I have resolved any merge conflicts
